snippet: The director of "Super Size Me" says it was easier to persuade the streaming-video service to back his latest project, "A Day in the Life," compared with a cable TV outlet.
abstract: The director of "Super Size Me" says it was easier to persuade the streaming-video service to back his latest project, "A Day in the Life," compared with a cable TV outlet.

headline.main: Morgan Spurlock on Producing a Show for Hulu
